alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:08PM CDT until June 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 407 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Tyler, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Kilgore, Overton, New London, Arp, Clarksville City, Liberty City, Joinerville, New Chapel Hill, Winona, Red Springs, Rolling Meadows and Laird Hill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
